ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.PLAY_TIME_ACTION: local amount = EffectDC():Get_Int(1) local mana_string = "{"..(amount).."}" local player = EffectController() if player:CanAfford(mana_string) then Object():Tap() player:TapLand(mana_string) end
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( EffectDC():Get_Int(1) ) end
local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if(target ~= nil) then target:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_TRAMPLE, 1 ) end
